title: ATLAS - ALL ACTIVE CLIENTS - PLEDGE ACTS, Cards, External Asset Managers - Part 3

task_list.instruction_title:
INTEGRATION de Actes de nantissement

---- comptage des clients modifiés suite envoi actes de nantissement 
select cli.nbr_co_0145 as Société, count (*) as Nombre
  from nhdbo.t_client cli, nhdbo.t_fu_client fu
 where nbr_co_0145 in (201,007)
 and cli.code_pledge_client_0145 > 0
 and cli.nbr_co_0145 = fu.nbr_co_1057
 and cli.nbr_client_0145 = fu.nbr_client_1057
 group by cli.nbr_co_0145;
